entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,806Chapters: 11/27Kudos: 71

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Unaware of the world beyond the castle walls, Merlin’s life changes when the brave knight Arthur enters the picture, showing him the depth of love and teaching him to find his own voice.Together, they must face the trials that come their way.

entry.title: run, like the hounds of hell are at your heels
entry.summary:
Author: insane_falcon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 709Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: Merlin winces as the wood creaks under his pry bar. He strains his ears, but only the sounds of nature echo back to him. Slowly he lifts himself up through the window. His foot slips on the way down and he falls to the ground with a dull thump. Pain radiates from his ankle. Merlin grits his teeth, pulling a bandage from his backpack and wrapping it around his ankle. The pain settles to a dull throb and that’s when Merlin hears it. A clicking noise. aka a The Last of Us au

entry.title: The Camelot Saga
entry.summary:
Author: the_cursebreaker

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 958Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 9

Summary: Arthur has been on an odyssey, a long journey that seemed to have no end in sight, just trying to get home to his husband and son.Merlin has been waiting for his husband to return from war for twenty years, keeping the suitors at bay and trying to protect himself, his son, and their kingdom.It has finally all come to an end, but there's one last thing Arthur has to do before he can reclaim his throne and see his husband once more. He must deal with the suitors.-Based on The Ithaca Saga from EPIC: The Musical

entry.title: you're miles away (but I still feel you)
entry.summary:
Author: dum_spiro_spero (requiemrose)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,802Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: "Witan hwæt hæfð been forloren funden eft on þǣm sæum of tīma..."Growing up in 21st-century London, it was easy for Duran to forget he was the son of a medieval king back from the dead and an immortal sorcerer from whom he had inherited immense magical power. He was happy living a quiet, normal life, where his biggest problem was coming up with new videos to post online.Then one day he breaks into his father's study and ends up stranded in the distant past. A past where his Dad was an arrogant prince coming into his own and his Pa faced constant threat of execution for the "crime" of being magic. A crime Duran was also guilty of, so long as he stayed in Camelot.At least he still had his mobile. Might as well get some new material before he went back home. Because he was definitely going home.(...Right?)

entry.summary:
Author: foundmyhome

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,059Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 964

Summary: Merlin has been alive for a very long time.He is not losing it... entry.title: last hope
entry.summary:
Author: annesbonny

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,843Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 32

Summary: The first time Merlin knew he was cursed, was the day he turned thirteen. This, like most things from then on in his life, was considered to be an omen of things to come.  Prince Merlin of Gwynedd is the latest in a long line of princes affected by a mysterious curse. Prince Arthur is duty bound to protect his people from a harsh winter, any way he can. An arranged marriage between the two princes surely can't go wrong...OR: An arranged marriage AU with a twist loosely inspired by a bit of Welsh mythology

entry.title: Chains of Eternity
entry.summary:
Author: Splashstar01

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,341Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 69

Summary: TW: EXTREME GORE/GRAPHIC RAPE. DEAD DOVE. DO NOT EAT.(Cover photo shows a bit of blood.)At 14, Arthur endures brutal torture in pointless human experiments by extremely attractive, human-like aliens. Among them is prodigy 16-year-old Merlin, a cruel alien boy scientist who quickly becomes twistedly obsessed with Arthur. Arthur is soon purchased as a pet by Merlin and removed from the lab, where Merlin is determined to break him down and mold him into someone who will return his affections, no matter how many millennia it takes. Arthur clings desperately to his hatred as the last part of his identity.He refuses to give in to Stockholm Syndrome.(This fic is disgusting, horrid, the most frightening thing you've consumed this year. It's morally questionable. That's kind of the point. First few chapters is TORTURE PORN. Think Terrifier 3 but a love story lol.)

entry.title: In Another Life, In This One Too
entry.summary:
Author: Splashstar01

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,396Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Arthur Pendragon’s life was saved by a sacrifice from his alternate self—a twist of fate that left him with haunting dreams of a past life in which Merlin, his gentle and protective father, was also his lover. As Arthur grows up, those dreams become harder to ignore, and so do the feelings they awaken. Navigating high school to college, Arthur’s caught between the life he has and the one his heart remembers. Meanwhile, Merlin, the always-affectionate dad, has never turned his son down.Pt 2 in the "A Promise Beyond Time" series. Even though the two are connected, you don't have to read pt 1 to understand (but feel free! This fic is such a fix-it). This fic takes place in a different multi-verse to the first one but it's still very much connected. Wholly different vibes.

entry.title: I Will Burn The World, If It Would Keep You Warm.
entry.summary:
Author: Winters_Pheonix

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,091Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 15

Summary: By the year Prince Arthur Pendragon turned twenty-one and he came of age, he was already a man who had barely enjoyed a childhood. A man who had closed off his heart so fiercely that at times it seemed he did not even possess one. That was until, a young boy two years younger, with a cheeky smile, eyes like a clear river and raven hair walked into Camelot and insulted the prince at their very first meeting.His name...Merlin..................................................................................................................................................................................................An entire canon rewrite, with a darker and mature Arthur and an equally smarter Merlin.!!!!READ THE TAGS!!!!

entry.title: Wooden Dragons
entry.summary:
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,050Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 405

Summary: “You-” Ygraine said, stepping up to point a finger in Uther’s face. “You are a liar and a murderer. The fact someone as sweet and caring as Vivienne is destined to marry you is a tragedy in itself, but if you expect me to hand over my brother’s rightful claim to Camelot’s throne-”“My claim to Camelot’s throne,” Uther threw back, face growing more red as Arthur looked between his parents in utter bewilderment. Merlin didn’t blame him. He had envisioned Uther and Ygraine’s love story to be more… well, less based in war and battles.Ygraine’s eyes narrowed as she grabbed a goblet of wine and threw it in Uther’s face. A few of the guards shifted, but Uther only raised a hand to pause them, spitting out the wine with furious eyes.“You,” Ygraine said coldly. “Are unworthy to sit upon a stool, let alone a throne.”From a few feet away, Balinor scoffed as he sipped from his own goblet. “I kind of like having her as a hostage, Uther. She livens up the place.”OrIn a desperate attempt to save Arthur at Camlann, Merlin tries to reverse time. It works perhaps a tad too well.

entry.title: Of Mice and Kings
entry.summary:
Author: MyAmisFics

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,595Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 332

Summary: Morgana transforms Arthur into a small mouse in a fit of rage. As a mouse, Arthur must now find his way back to Camelot and his friends, in the hope that they can help him. Thankfully, he has a manservant who adores small animals.- - - - - - - -“Hello, little one!” Merlin used the same high-pitched voice that he usually used on babies and kittens. Arthur would never admit that he found it adorable. He lifted his hands to get a closer look at Arthur, who found it strange to be so close to his face. Merlin smiled at him and gently stroked his back with one long finger.And so the day went by, with Merlin believing the King was off with his knights, and the knights believing he was in the armory with Merlin. No one would notice that their King was missing until dinner time, or even late evening depending on their schedules.- - - - - - - - -
